body_html:
Hello,
I got the solution, simply add

saver.restore(sess, tf.train.latest_checkpoint(path/to/model/livetrain))

under sv.managed_session() for --mode inference,
please close this issue. Thanks and

Cheers

under sv.managed_session() for --mode inference,

body:
Hello, 
I got the solution, simply add
```
saver.restore(sess, tf.train.latest_checkpoint(path/to/model/livetrain))
```
under `sv.managed_session()` for --mode inference,
please close this issue. Thanks and

Cheers
